name: Fall of Jake Paul Hop World
description:
What is beat? I am glad you asked! This epic game is what you need to feel the power of song! Hop on tiles in the best beat of cool EDM songs. We recommend using headphones to feel that low bass.
Feel yourself nodding your head in rhythm with song. Game is simple, drag and hold to control the ball. Jump on each stunning tile and don't fall down! Cool backgrounds will change as you reach the end of track then it will loop and get quicker!
The fun will never end because this game is endless. See how far you can hop on tiles and share this game with your friends and family! Have epic time!

This is a fan made awesome game!

name: Littleroot Researchers
description:
Seven years after "Pokémon: Alpha Sapphire" events, Professor Birch recruited three new research assistants!
You will complete tasks, interact with nature, catch Pokémon, and make new friends!
However, during your adventure...you find something rare in Petalburg Woods...

name: Tedd'or
description:
Fantasy action-adventure RPG with an open world and diverse enemies.
Including a complex upgrade system and a lootbox-style way of obtaining new abilities.

The game contains a simple story you can follow to reveal secrets of the world you play in.
Multiple dungeons with juicy rewards you can obtain by putting your skills to the test.

The game also contains a competitive mode where you must defeat waves of enemies as fast as possible.

name: Gex Jr.
description:
Gex Jr. is a cancelled installment in the Gex series for the PlayStation. The game was developed by ImageBuilder Software and was pitched to Eidos Interactive.

A prototype of the game was released online by justz00t on April 2nd, 2022.

name: Winter's Wish: Spirits of Edo
description: A fantasy set in historical Japan in the spirit of the first localized console otome game, Hakuoki: Demon of the Fleeting Blossom. A moving, emotional tale with gorgeous visuals and multiple endings to discover. Choose from one of three different Oniwaban divisions for the heroine to join and get to know her colleagues. Be careful — they may not all be human!

name: Green Lava Studios Volume 2
description:
Over 200 levels, minigames and even real cookie recipes, can you handle the hardcore, platforming challenge of Fenix Furia?

Shoot your way out of fly-infested levels; beat the bosses and save your loved one in Birdcake!

It’s the grand finale of the My Name is Mayo trilogy! Will Mayo finally learn valuable life lessons? Or default to the same old-same old?

name: Angry Birds Hot Wheels Smashup
description: Angry Birds Hot Wheels Smashup is a cancelled Angry Birds and Hot Wheels crossover. It was created around September 12th, 2017 as a playable advertisement and was known as It was known as "Angry Birds Hot Wheels Smash Up". Though the game was cancelled, some screenshot can be find on Mike Rodda's portfolio.

name: Instant Sports: All-Stars
description: In Instant Sports: All-Stars, you can play a variety of feel-good activities directly inspired by All-american favorite sports! In INSTANT SPORTS, everyone can play with ease by simply moving with the motion-gaming of the Nintendo Switch™. You can also play in the regular way on both Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 5 through button mode!

name: Himemiya-san ha Kamaitai
description: Sin descripción

name: Foretales
description: Decide the fate of the world in this ingenious story-driven card game. Foretales offers a unique take on the adventure genre, with a multitude of playstyles and story paths through which you can save the world… or bring about its end.

name: Mika and the Witch's Mountain
description: Soar with the wind on your broomstick, deliver packages to your friends, and explore a vibrant sandbox world in a coming of age adventure about an aspiring witch!

name: Egypt Collection
description: Collection released in Germany containing all 3 games of the Egypt-trilogy on a single DVD.

name: One of the Victims
description: From being lost in a forest to end up fighting normal zombies, running from the fast ones, and avoiding traps. Something is abnormal out there.. especially on hard mode! But the question is, will you accept being One Of The Victims?

name: Zemblanity
description: Zemblanity is an atmospheric first-person horror game. What seemed like a little creepy invitation over from an old childhood friend turns into disturbing uncovering of mysterious forces ruling in the mansion. Will you find a way out?

name: Escape Down
description: An adventure in which you play a prisoner who must escape from his captor. You will explore dungeons full of enemies and face powerful dungeon bosses, collecting materials with which to equip your group of fighters.

name: Nature's Habit
description: A video game made by Swinging Pixels, set in the year 2060, the ecosphere's systems are at the brink of collapsing. and you play as a smart synthetic waterdrop your main objective is to traverse the environment created by a group of scientists and ecologists named "Clepsydra".

name: No Anglerfish
description: You awaken on a desert island with no knowledge of who you are, or how you arrived there. Explore and unlock surrounding islands by playing the mysteriously powerful arcade machines spread throughout the lands.

name: Wild West Gringos
description: Classic Western Shootout Duel - One-on-One. Polish your boots, clean your revolver, and hit the road. It's almost High Noon ... and losing is not an option.

name: Choose your Poison
description: You must take a pill. Some are safe, others will kill you. Using process of elimination, survive as long as you can, with as few casualties as possible.

name: Letter Bender
description: A spelling-based puzzle game.

name: Fanite
description: A remake of Magicite, same gameplay loop just a tad bit harder, with new stuff added, but without multiplayer.

name: Hexagonal Tower
description: [Hexagonal Tower] is a tower defense game with cards and roguelike random elements. Try to deploy your turrets and various reinforcement components in the dungeon to form a unique and powerful defense. Darkness is coming. Guard the last fortress of mankind with your wisdom!

name: Arkheim: Realms at War
description: Experience a new take on the competitive 4x genre with Arkheim - Realms at War: Team based strategy in a free to play MMO fantasy world, played in game rounds of 10 weeks each!

name: Terror Shooter Apocalypse
description: You remained the sole survivor of the city after a massive enemy attack in this part of Europe.

name: Mysperyence
description:
Mysperyence is a coined word that combines the words mystery and experience, and is a VR Murder Mystery game that is played simultaneously by multiple players.

Players dive into the crime scene to "relive" the actions of the characters and gather information such as what the characters were doing at the crime scene and what conversations they were having.

If the players can find the murderer by discussing with each other based on this information, they win the game.

name: Aster Force
description: Aster Force is a 3D sci-fi spaceship shooter game set in the far reaches of space. Players may choose from multiple ships to pilot, as they patrol and protect Sector 7184 from the sinister space pirates known as Specter. Join the crew of SS Gallaway to bring peace and order to the stars.

name: Bugged
description: Show your bug smashing skills in this work-from-home action puzzle game. Break the bug blocks and beat the performance record with precision clicking before time runs out. Oh no! Don’t let the REAL bugs distract you as they crawl around your quarantined apartment… Crush them too!

name: Die Die Die and Try
description: A simple runner where you have to dodge obstacle and finish as fast as possible.

name: Sillage
description: Sillage is an Rpg-adventure game that takes place in a fantasy world where magic and technology interact. Explore floating islands looking for treasures.

name: Admeowture
description: This is a third person shooting game. Players just need to hold down the mouse and let go. Throw out the synthetic drink and you can play. Right click to knock down the cats in an abnormal state, and you can take food from them. Then we'll have a delicious meal.

name: Dustland Rider
description: It's the year 2272. A powerful solar flare scorched Earth and destroyed cities all around leaving the planet to ruins and scattered survivors. The Dustlands are what's left – pirates, ghost towns and the seven settlements. Survive & thrive in a post-apocalyptic future - opportunity calls!

name: Sisters Possession 1
description: Sisters Possession Is Srpg. By possessing a girl, we will advance the battle to the advantage.

name: King of Kinks
description: King of Kinks is a squad role-playing game based around auto 5v5 battles. Strategize heroes with unique fighting skills to overcome your enemies in battle. Power up your girls and build up your unbeatable squad! Investing time & resources in your squad of gorgeous women will get you kingly (and kinky) rewards!

name: Virtua Volleyball
description: Get ready to experience authentic action in stunning locations at various times of day. On the beach, in an olympic stadium facing crowds, and more. Improve your volleyball skills and strategy thanks to virtual reality and realistic interactions. The team, the referee and fans are waiting for you.

name: Lonely Knight
description: Lonely Knight is a story that immerses you in an epic adventure in the medieval era. Avenge your wife as you battle invading forces, go on game-changing quests, and make influential choices. Fight in brutal battles where you will experience fast-paced combat, castle sieges, and more.

name: Blind Wizard's Assistant
description: Blind wizards assistant is an unique turn based RPG where you play as an assistant to mighty but blind wizard. Collect elements, find recipes, craft potions to heal and eliminate monsters.

name: Waves Running Simulator
description: Have you seen the enormous waves destroying the planet? If not, you are in the right place! In Waves Running Simulator you have to escape from the tsunami as fast as possible.

name: Tales from the Crossing: The Captain's Chair
description: When a misfit crew on the last test flight of an experimental engine wakes up on the wrong side of the other side of the galaxy, what’s a Captain to do? You decide!

name: The Game of Unknown
description: The Game of Unknown is a survival horror game where you must last in an abandoned school until the sun rises. How hard could it be?

name: Did You Scared
description: A horror game based on fictional stories. The player can play story mode as well as multiplayer. a multiplayer physics-based prop hunt mixed with classic horror survival.

name: Silver Axe: The Honest Elf
description: Classic 2D platformer, play as a nimble elf and dash through the ancient fairytale forest. Defeat powerful Insomniac creatures, cast spells by combining four elements to summon thunder and entangle flame. Collect the heart of the goddess, unleash the hidden power of your Silver Axe.

name: Tower Words
description: Word game that mixes tetris, categories game and word search.

name: The Quantum Cat
description: Stay dead! Stay alive! Oh no, Mr. Mustaches got into trouble and now is lost on the quantic world playing Schrödinger's cat. Alternate between "alive" and "dead" to move forward through the quantum space in order to come back home on this unique precision platform!

name: HoopsFPS
description: HoopsFPS is a first person multiplayer basketball game. You can play 1vs1 or 3vs3 against friends or foes.

name: Mirror Spirits
description: Mirror Spirits is a co-op story-based thriller game that can be played with 2-4 people. Do your best to clean the house connecting to the parallel universe. Escape. Attack. Clean the house before you die.

name: Dandi World
description: The world of the arts has been invaded by a villain who hates artistic expressions and wants to destroy them. Embark on this adventure to save the world of the arts and rescue the Danditos from the clutches of Dr. Hate!

name: Hidden Farm Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Sunshower
description: When the rain starts and nobody else seems to mind that it destroys everything in its path, one plant-topped robot answers the call in this rainy-day arcade survival game.

name: Lollipop Knight
description: Lollipop knight is a challenging jumping game where you have to overcome various obstacles and traps.

name: Planet Conqueror
description: Planet Conqueror is FPS science fiction game where you have to collect minerals exploring different planets. The main goal in the game is to upgrade your gear up to be able to defeat the Alien boss. Each planet generates randomly, making the possibility to explore 10 000+ different planets!

name: Liminality
description: Enter the Backrooms in virtual reality. Explore the endless liminal spaces, record with your camcorder, and hope that you’re alone.

name: Tower of the Sage
description: A classic rogue-like deck-builder game with some unique twists like Talent system and Random encounters and interesting Relics which change every run.

name: John Christian 2
description: The game John Christian 2 tells the heroism of a young man in a spiritual battle, who after receiving the armor of God, begins his mission to spread the gospel to every creature. On his journey, John is taken by God to a village and discovers that many people are in need of his help.

name: Ubel
description: A visual novel where eight participants are forced to play a death game where they have to vote every two hours. Who will survive? Who will betray? Who are the masterminds behind it all?

name: Wish of Abyss Dungeon
description: A real-time strategy to explore the dungeon.

name: Chesskoban Cyber
description: Community Based Chess Game. On a cyber map, Move Knights, Bishops, Rooks, go through Portals and capture the Enemy Pieces. Level up by Playing and Building. Be the Best in the levels and win Medals. Reinvent in Creative Mode by creating your own levels and sharing.

name: The Smash Cars Tournament
description: Your goal is to pass every mission without being crushed. It probably seems pretty hard at first glance, but once you get it, you will become a true master.

name: Touch Some Grass
description: Someone told me to go touch some grass. I'm pretty sure this is what they meant.

name: Mini Pipes
description: Mini Pipes is a game that mixes minimalist puzzle and puzzle pipes. Rotate all pipes until all water connections are closed.

name: Mana Chess
description: Mana Chess is a colorful, turn-based adventure with Roguelite progression. Early Access players traverse three unique areas, and ten stages - collecting randomly offered abilities and items. Manage your resources efficiently to clear stages in as few turns as possible, and earn rewards.

name: Dungeon & Burglar
description: The player can only move. Sneak through traps on different floors to get treasures in this thrilling and action-packed game! Find the best way to conquer each of the 30 dungeon floors by observing enemy movements!

name: Jack Pilgrim: Space Within
description: Rebel against the evil Sickness as you fight your way deeper inside the world of Jack's mind to discover the dark secrets behind his madness, all the way accompanied by your spirit animal in this psychological first-person-shooter/adventure.

name: Quantum Apex
description: Sci Fi Stunt/Street Racer With Nitrous. Strong emphasis on FUN! Handling Is a well balanced fusion of Arcade and simulation. There is no traction control There is simply the car, the player and the physics. Race Tracks are designed to test every Cm of your driving capabilities.

name: Moonstuck
description: Relaxing rage game in a cutesy wholesome Moonstuck land. Delicate jump-balancing rage platformer where your job is to escape, while staying relaxed.

name: Entomophobia
description: A Singleplayer Rougelite Bullethell where you kill 10s of thousands of insects/bugs. including mini-boss/boss fights every 5-10 minutes. Slay Bugs, Get Upgrades, Kill more. Unlock Characters and weapons by completing achievements.

name: Arcade Squad
description: Arcade Squad is a classic arcade shooter with 15 levels and 6 different spaceships, each with 6 different skins. Rise to the challenge and free the galaxy.

name: ...Knew the Beginning
description: A world you don't recognize anymore. You wake up inside a bar after the apocalypse. The barkeeper of said bar is in trouble. Do what you can to help him, after all he is all you remember.

name: The Infernal Return
description: The Infernal Return is a role-playing adventure game. Players will play the role as Koward, a guy who was abducted to the netherworld to sort out puzzles, collect items and eventually find his way back to life. Meanwhile, the game provides multiple branch quests and fun gameplay.

name: Quad Dice Defence
description: This is a tower defense game where you use four dice to build a turret. The rolls of the dice are the ability value of "number of shots", "time reload", "damage(& range)" and "magazine". Try your best to clear all 40 stages, which are getting more and more difficult!

name: Peasant TD
description: Peasent TD is a fantasy tower defence game with card game elements. Towers are built and upgraded through cards that are bought in the shop or crafted from the forge. This means every game will be unique, you will not be able to rely on a specific build order or strategy. Adaptation is necessary.

name: Office Elevator
description: Today might be just a regular workday, or you might end up in a complete alternative reality. Office Elevator is a survival horror game with puzzles that takes place in a dark universe.

name: Get Your Sheep Together
description: A 3D platformer where you herd your emotions by hopping, shrinking and dashing your way through obstacles. Don't hold in too many feelings or it may just blow up in your face!

name: Alakenisland
description: Explore the island, fight off the pirates in Action RPG style, evade attacks, play online or locally with your friends, strategize your items for maximum combat damage, drive a boat armored with a cannon and sink the Pirate Ship!

name: Heroes of the Galaxy
description: Space adventure with open world, FPS shooter and a lot of missions. Choose your own carrier. Are you a space pirate or a brave space ranger? Choose your destiny. The galaxy needs you, commander! Openworld game with multiple worlds to explore.

name: Happy Mining
description: Discover a colorful world filled with resources in a single player mining adventure. Mine resources and expand your productions to earn even more gold.

name: Murasame
description: Murasame is an RPG that mixes in romantic comedy. There are laughter, tears, and a little sadness combined. Here comes the slapstick fantasy love-comedy RPG!

name: Creepslore
description: Enter a world filled with drunk monsters and their offbeat shenanigans: Birdman's arm got stolen as part of a performance art. Lettuce wants you to eat him. Doctor Scientist rents his body out to a Wound Parasite, and the Talking Lamp is... well, a talking lamp. Wait- What is going on here?

name: Space Out
description: Space Out blends elements from Breakout, pinball, and a space shooter to provide a unique, fast-paced, and challenging arcade experience.

name: Perceptio
description: Perceptio is a VR puzzle game set on a small floating Japanese aesthetic island, solve 10 small puzzles and fix the worlds time to complete the game.

name: Hank: Drowning on Dry Land
description: Hank: Drowning On Dry Land is a time-traveling game in witch you play as Hank - a Batman-esque vigilante fighting a sadistic mastermind calling himself The Unraveler.

name: Thunder League Online
description: A strategic MOBA-styled game where you play as a team to complete objectives against the opposing team. Play as unique adorable agents and use their abilities to change the outcomes of the chaotic battle arena! Defend the base, eliminate the enemies or just do both! The strategies are all yours!

name: Cute Cats 2
description: Cute kittens are back in action! These fluffy fellas would train your memory and attention. Spend your time with pleasure and benefit. Compare pictures with cute kittens and find differences between them.

name: My Girlfriend is a Musician
description: “My Girlfriend is a Musician” is a Music Tour Management Simulator and Yuri Dating Simulator. Play as an aspiring junior tour manager helming a series of concerts around Europe for an eccentric yet extremely entertaining Rockstar!

name: Girl Raid
description: The protagonist of the beautiful girl, looking down and shooting, passing through the five-layer defense of Skynet Technology, eliminating the doomsday war robot, and capturing the boss king behind the scenes

name: Escape: Lia
description: Lia, an 8-year old child got trapped in someone's dark basement. What secrets are hidden in this basement? Discover suspicious items, follow clues, and solve puzzles. Will you be able to escape safely?

name: Drifter's Tales
description: This strategic card game invites you to live small stories in the universe of The First Spine. Choose a story and fight fearsome enemies! You may discover the secret that surrounds the Forgotten Valley.

name: Cool Kid Cody
description: In a world of Losers, Cool Kids and Gods, where Losers wish they were Cool Kids, Cool Kids wish they were Gods and Gods rule over all, Cool Kid Cody embarks on his quest for Godhood! All he's gotta do is achieve the impossible: transform the biggest Loser in school into a Cool Kid.

name: Comrade Quack
description: Comrade Quack is a fun, hybrid, third person tower defense game aimed at young adult audiences! Play as Comrade Quack to defend the Mother Pond from filthy Capitalist Pigs with an array of combat turrets, barriers, and more!

name: I Love Finding Critters
description: I Love Finding Critters is a classic hidden object game where you can search for a huge assortment of animals! Squirrels, hamsters, chicks, ducks, and so many more! Find them all in beautiful scenic locations and solve puzzles and play mini games as you go along.

name: Burnit Quest
description: Blast baddies and burn calories!Use the power of exercise to defeat the evil Somno and save your island from the curse of eversleep.Burnit Quest is a mobile enhanced fitness platformer, connect your phone and PC to the same network and get ready to sweat!

name: Goddess of War Essa
description: Goddess Of War Essa is a vertical scrolling flying shooter. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

name: Lenin Simulator
description: Lenin Simulator is a political simulator where you run Soviet Russia from 1920 to 1923. You have the potential to radically alter the decisions made and history as a whole.

name: Local Paper Small Town
description: Local Paper Small Town is a 2-player co-op puzzle game about spreading happiness around a quirky papercraft town. Team up with a friend, using a physical newspaper and VR, to discover Smalltown and its charming cast of characters by communicating and relating between both formats.

name: Irritability & Mood Swings
description: You wake up in your room after being passed out from drug abuse. As you wander the house, you start to find that things aren't what they seem. Your mother is missing and something is in the house with you... Escape the house or get sober before it's too late...

name: My Pets: Maze
description: Unique game that brings the aesthetics of children's maze books to the digital world. Are you ready to draw?

name: Cluck
description: Cluck is an extremely fast-paced fps arena shooter. Spawn with only a pistol and find weapons, armor, health and powerups such as the Quack and Speed along the map. Jump pads and portals are also around the map, enabling you to get to your destination. And customize your own chicken!

name: Firewerx
description: Ready to Become A Pyrotechnics Expert? Firewerx is a firework building simulation game with an ever growing list of customisation options and possibilities. Choose your colours, shapes, effects and more to create the greatest firework show!

name: Wind Angel III
description: "Wind Angel Ⅲ" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: Tricking 0
description: Welcome to Tricking 0, the first ever tricking video game ! Use the Flick-it gameplay to Flip, Twist and Kick and Combine 100+ Tricks to express your own creativity. Challenge your friends or bots in the multiplayer modes, practice bigger and harder combos in free mode and become the best tricker !

name: Super Life: Franchise Lord
description: Can you really take over the world with a sandwich? Short answer... MONEY IS EVIL!

name: Golden Mine Pickaxe 2: Mummy Tombs
description: Golden Mine Pickaxe 2 is a sequel to the sandbox game of the same name with RPG elements. Your hero goes to ancient tombs to find even more gold and new resources. Move deeper into the tombs, upgrade your weapons and defeat new enemies to collect as many resources as possible!

name: Chinese Train Trip
description: First-person exploration. Genre: adventure. Train travel simulator in China. You will find a free world, buying and selling items, riding a train and much more.

name: Outcasts of Dungeon
description: Outcasts of Dungeon is a third person fantasy action Being in the role of a powerful War Mage with dozens of deadly weapons and spells, defend your kingdom fortress from a rampaging mob of beastly invaders.

name: Super Ate in Wonderland
description: Time for a cute and spooky adventure! Our little hero, Ate, is going on an adventure to see his sweetheart, Niko, who is at the top of a mountain!

name: Volcanon
description: "Volcanon" is a 2D platformer game with a focus on analog sticks and speedrunning.In this pixelly beautiful world, unleashing the magma power and facing these well-design levels.

name: Zap Dem Rats
description: Zap Dem Rats is a third person adventure RPG of skill where the player helps Mr. Prez regain the Whitehouse. Along the way Mr. Prez transforms zombies into citizens and vanquishes his adversaries

name: Spearmint Goose
description: Hidden object game in the cartoon Strip Club.

name: Sweet Surge
description: Navigate the unending ocean of Cioko. Build, direct, compose and customize your crew. Overcome the greatest crews and challenges on your rise to ultimate juicy sweetness.

name: Word Crystal
description: A daily word guessing game with four linked words of five letters apiece.

name: Shady Business
description: Shady business - The security of your homeland is under threat! Take control of the plane and destroy the rising threat before it destroys you in this sidescroller shooter!

name: Left Stranded
description: Left Stranded is a factory and a base building game set in a 2D procedurally generated world.You are a scientist sent to an unknown planet to harvest resources, build production lines and setup the foundation for further colonization.

name: Unblocking
description: Unblocking is a casual VR game based on dragging piece blocks to clear lines/boards. It supports 3 game modes: Puzzle (multiple levels), Relax (time limit mode) and Arcade (lifes based mode)

name: Demon World Survival
description: Demon World Survival is a survival game, monsters will take the initiative to attack you, it is a casual, female protagonist, barrage shooting, cute style game

name: Dulce et Decorum
description: Just another 2D platformer shooter game with pixel art graphics to boot. You can jump around while blasting your enemies with three different methods of combat, and protect your village from an evil immortal.

name: Lawnarchy
description: A card game for gardening lunatics: manicure your lawn, trim your hedges – and steam roll over your neighbors' flowers!

name: Arhaekon
description: Become an Arhaekon and recover lost treasures & knowledge, bleed your minions and forge them into something more, rebuild what has fallen into decay and lay waste to the abominations holding the world captive, in our Tactical turn-based dungeon crawler.

name: Card Girl Army
description: Card Girl Army is a cartoon-style turn-based card game. Each card has different skills and attributes, players need to collect more cards to grow their team.

name: Rescue Team: Heist of the Century
description: Priceless works of art are disappearing from galleries all over the world! Natural disasters occur simultaneously with these heists! As the head of a rescue team you will have to do the impossible - stop earthquakes, deal with hurricanes and find out who is behind this monstrous crime.

name: The Bouncing Ball
description: The Bouncing Ball is a physics-based puzzle platformer homebrew game for the Game Boy.

name: Dino's Offline Adventure
description: Dino's Offline Adventure is an endless runner homebrew for the Game Boy in the veins of the Chrome Dino game.

name: GameBoy Wordle
description: GameBoy Wordle is a word puzzle homebrew game for the Game Boy.

name: Mona and the Witch's Hat
description: A short homebrew platformer for the Game Boy.

name: Mario Kart: Virtual Cup
description: Mario Kart: Virtual Cup is a homebrew fan game for the Virtual Boy.

name: Hyper Fighting
description: Hyper Fighting started as a homebrew Street Fighter fan game for the Virtual Boy, later being released as an unlicensed pirate game for the console (since it rips off Street Fighter II in every aspect without licensing from Capcom).

name: Rocket Mania
description: Take control of a small rocket as you fly from launch to landing pad throughout 90 levels avoiding all the obstacles along the way!

name: Tic-Tac-Tanks
description: Tic Tac Tanks is a tactical coffee break puzzle game inspired by Tic-Tac-Toe. Command toy-like vehicles in each challenging puzzle. Place your units on the grid thoughtfully. Each unit's placement will affect how the battle plays out. Line up your units on the rows and columns to score bonus points.

name: Cube World
description: Cube world is a simple puzzle game, similar to Tetris. In the game, you can operate aswd to move the small squares left and right, make a position and put the same colors together

name: Ebanashi: Kaiwa
description: A scary picture. You may find this picture scary. You may think it is abnormal. Or there may be a picture that makes you happy.

name: Train Station Renovation: Germany
description: Continue your journey as a renovation company specialised in restoring railway stations in Train Station Renovation - Germany DLC! 9 new stations inspired by real life equivalents await your arrival - your steady and reliable hand is required once again!

name: My Pet Rock
description: My Pet Rock is a collection of mini games inspired by early arcade games and modern endless runners. If you are looking for a fun, aesthetically pleasing and relatively casual game to play then My Pet Rock is for you. Come and customize your newest pet, while earning the highest scores around.

name: TheBootCamp
description: Challenge your FPS Gaming Skills in a Large Level in two ways: Still or Runner

name: Darkness of the Coast
description: Your in a third person character view playing as an 18- year old boy called Anders whos scared of the world and his fate. The game is action-packed as the character can attack the enemies in the third person, swim, and even drive. The game is filled with cutscenes as it gives the story good balance.

name: VR AirHockey
description: Giant air field hockey played on a fantastic field.

name: I Human Machine
description: I Human machine:against machine or be one 2D Rougelike Pixel Action Game, for PC

name: Lust Academy: Season 1
description: Lust Academy is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel about adventures and studying in the school of magic and wizardry. Play as a young guy who got invited to Cordale Academy. The whole world full of sorcery and passion awaits you!

name: The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child: Log5
description: Two silent wanderers,6 full chapters,A game of exploration and adventure

name: Fishing Kingdom
description: Fishing Kingdom is a slot-machine style causal fishing game. No need for complex playing skills, just shot fish, win gold and collect treasure, super relaxation, super decompression.

name: CannonBall
description: "CannonBall" is a casual shooting game that trains the nerve reflex ability. Operate the mouse to rotate the turret, shoot bullets to hit the ball, and pass the level within a limited number of times!

name: A Siren's Call VR: Death Comes At Night
description: Elliot has decided to return home after 4 years a mysterious email labeled from his brother to stay away and stop asking questions. Elliot rushes off to find out the truth and returns to his old family home .

name: Love Colors: Pixel Seasons
description: Go through seasons, remind yourself of childhood joy and explore the unknown with this DLC! 100 new pictures to color on your own or with family and friends!

name: Love Colors: Everyday Pixels
description: Enjoy and paint more stunning pixel art: mandalas, vehicles, famous paintings, people of various professions and others!

name: United Assault: Battle of the Bulge
description: An open world rogue lite FPS set in 1944's depiction of the Ardennes.

name: Root: Exiles & Partisans & Vagabonds
description: Two classic expansions arrive in the wood! Three new Vagabonds are sneaking through the forest! Plus an all-new deck for an even wilder wood! Contains the Vagabond Pack & Exiles and Partisans Deck.

name: Summer With You
description: A Japanese-style visual novel. A gripping story with four endings, a huge number of choices, original music and animated sprites of the main characters will allow you to immerse yourself in a cruel world of deception and sincerity, betrayal and loyalty, happiness and despair.

name: Bad Bad
description: You play as a shooter along the way shooting bombs, destroying barricades, finding supplies and roads until you see a helicopter to complete the game. After the battle, don't forget to admire the anime foot wall on the road.

name: Relics 2: The Crusader's Tomb
description: Four thousand miles. Twenty thousand pounds. Four murderous rivals. One unforgettable adventure.

name: Godfall: Ultimate Edition
description: Aperion is on the precipice of ruin. You are the last of the Valorian knights, god-like warriors able to equip Valorplates, legendary armor sets that transform wielders into unstoppable masters of melee combat. Ascend in Godfall, the first-of-its-kind, looter-slasher, melee action-RPG.

name: 79 Pompeii
description: 79 Pompeii is an adventure style game set in the ancient city of Pompeii, during the volcanic eruption that destroyed it in year 79.

name: Behind the Horizon: The Desert
description: Expands the game Behind the Horizon with a new exciting main story, many new areas, items, spells and a new climate zone! - A farm RPG in a nature simulation that keeps changing the world. Dive into a new adventure! BtH-The Desert awaits you...

name: Chest Mate
description: A precision based tower defense/puzzle game that focuses on optimization! Control your cannon, optimize your defenses and defend your mate! Chest Mate is a challenging aim-based strategy game.

name: Retrieving the Past: Steam Edition
description: Action, Adventure & Romance. Lots of beautiful women for you as Jensen Wenchester to meet and have fun times with. Beware there are sinister forces trying to stop you.

name: Deliverance
description: Deliverance is a story of mystery, thrill and discovery. A choice-based adult visual novel allows you to explore the detective’s both sides. The hero, fighting to save his loved ones, or the villain willing to abandon all morality for power.

name: Yummy Girl 2
description: Sweet buns, ruddy cupcakes, juicy burgers - all these yummy girls love to eat. They are just waiting for you to feed them! ( ˘▽˘)っ♨

name: Milf Toys 2
description: Hentai is not just 2D girls, this is a whole art. And in this art units understand.

name: The Ducksuckers
description: The Ducksuckers is a Kinetic Comedy Visual Novel about music, battling inner demons and the inability to let go. Taking about 40-60 minutes to read it's a short and sweet read, with some dramatic elements.

name: Feartten Noir Story
description: Feartten noir Story - is a 2d platformer with a mysterious horror theme. Go through the cursed depths of hell and try to get out of the nightmare of a boy. Are you ready to go through all the circles of hell to overcome your fears?

name: Hidden Harbor Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Dungeon Rummage: Tiqee's Escape
description: Join Tiqee, a Human/Goblin half breed, on her adventures to escape the dungeon of Echeia.

name: GlassBox
description: GlassBox is a puzzle game where you have to get a ball out of a maze using rotation and gravity. A Marble, a Crate, a Toilet Roll, a Doll - collect all 50 balls to help you beat the best time in 100 levels... or just play it chill... you decide.

name: Cursed Spire
description: Explore unknown islands, build a comfy house, fight or cooperate with other players to survive in a world full of mysteries and danger. It's up to you whether you want to become an archer, a soldier, or a mage. Discover lost artifacts to figure out all the secrets.

name: Retro Three Kingdoms: Special edition
description: We made the fun of MMORPG, the fun of hack and slash, and the fun of MOBA. We will do our best to become a game that records the history that players write. We do not provide auto-combat.

name: Capture Creatures
description: Welcome to the Capture Mansion, home of Capture Creatures. Here you can fill your collection and explore the mansion, all while risking your deck. No matter how skilled you are, there's a place for you in the Capture Mansion. Remember, whether you win or lose, just try to have fun!

name: Wind Angel Challenge
description: Wind Angel Challenge is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: Hit Him
description: Our game is a human pear simulator.

name: The Labyrinth Adventure of Demons
description: "The labyrinth adventure of demons" is an exploration for the labyrinth. Players who constantly Collect Magic objects embark on a journey of exploration.

name: Permanence TD
description: Tower defense that will make you think

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Greece
description: Puzzles about Greece!

name: ET Superman: Wrath of Tyrannosaurus Rex
description: Peter, who has been collecting dinosaur eggs, went to the abandoned Tyrannosaurus Rex park. Unfortunately, he was trapped by the mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex. The ferocious mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex chases Ethan Pitt. Ethan Pitt needs to use all his wisdom and ability to escape.

name: Vincemus: Air Combat
description: Fly through the theaters of World War II with fighters planes from across the world. Intercept, Raid, Defend, Survive in theatres of World War II. Vincemus is an arcade semi-realistic air combat shooter, The game is avalable on WindowsOS and MacOS.

name: Lockdown VR: Circus of the Dead
description: You are an aspiring group of performers and have been invited for a performance. Assigned to an abandoned dressing room due to a lack of facilities, strange things started to happen. Alone or with up to 6 players, explore, gather clues, and escape before its too late!

name: Baldwin's Bear
description: It's the magic of a carnival through the eyes of a child! From a fishing pool to a bouncy castle to a ghost train, each minigame is unique from the last, and holds its own little tricks and secrets. Collect tickets as Baldwin to afford the teddy bear, or race a friend for it in versus mode!

name: Blue rabbit a world of shapes and lost colors
description: Blue rabbit has forgotten about everything in this hallway platformer.

name: Cosmic Monsters 2 Enclaves Dawn
description: Cosmic Monsters 2 Enclaves Dawn is a 2D RPG Game, explore the ORASIS Region and stop the Enclave!

name: Planet TD
description: 6 different types of towers! 4 planets with different characteristics! 25 different enemies. Drones, Tanks, Biorobotic enemies and many different ground and air vehicles! Snowy and Glacial maps, Desert and Arid lands! Prepare to defend the solar system against invaders!

name: 白晓
description: A visual novel about friendship and promise. A high school girl encounters a mysterious white-haired girl, and the story begins...

name: Demonophobia
description:
Demonophobia is a Guro Survival Horror game where the emphasis is primarily on horror rather than survival.

The game is about a 14-year-old Japanese schoolgirl, Sakuri Kunikai. After trying a demon summoning ritual, she wakes up in a terrifying realm of demons and tries to escape from this hell she ensnared herself into.

name: Freakfield 2042
description: FREAKFIELD 2042 is a third or first person shooter where you take on the role of a unique soldier equipped with enough arsenal to take on anyone in front and win at the front.

name: Grim Quest
description: Grim Quest is a classic turn-based RPG / Dungeon Crawler with minimalist aesthetics and a retro vibe. Set in a dark fantasy world with elements of Lovecraftian horror, it puts a lot of emphasis on atmosphere and immersion, with sombre visuals, melancholy music and lots of written text.

name: Trivia Party
description: A mix of trivia and a classic board game. What else can you ask from a game to enjoy with your friends and family? Trivia Party is a local multiplayer game that mixes a ludo game and a trivia competition. Obtain better results in the trivia, and get a better dice for the ludo. Check it out!

name: Undoing Evil
description: Undoing Evil is a role-playing adventure game in a fantasy world with turn-based combat. Explore the world to discover its beauty, the people, and uncover the filth and the plots that lurk beneath the surface. Your very life is being threatened. Hire a group of adventurers and solve the conundrum.

name: Eyeball Master
description: Eyeball Master is a Light skit Roguelite + RPG game On the way of the adventure, you must see the most suitable moving route, as well as the matching of skills and passive choices to eliminate obstacles ahead!

name: Masterchef Chinese Food Edition
description: Even if you're not a chef, with this game you will learn step by step very fast how to do your favorite chinese food like noodles, dumplings and more.

name: Zombie Raid: No One Survives
description: Zombie Raid is a PvP top-down shooter, with realistic looking tactical battles. Raid infected city, fight for survival in team battles.

name: Monster in the Dark: Remaster
description: Monster In The Dark is designed to provide a single-player horror experience. You must have time to escape from the monster, using your inner feelings, running away from the monster, intuitively eating to find a way out, you must become a player who must cope with this situation

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Puzzles 4
description: Puzzles of incredible random images!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Love
description: Romantic puzzles about Love!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Kittens 2
description: Puzzles of beautiful kittens!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Canada
description: Puzzles about Canada!

name: Nightfall
description: Nightfall is a top down sci-fi game with turn based combat. After waking up on a strange world without any recollection of your past, you must explore, fight, and survive in order to rediscover your memories and find out why, and by whom they were taken away.

name: Fantasy Adventure
description: Barrage shooting game, a game with minimalist gameplay and roguelite elements There are 25 small spaces in the game, and there are monsters in each space. After completing the challenge monsters, enter the next space.

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler: The Caverns of Grimlock
description: DLC opens up another world that you can travel to when you go through the Gate. Fight challenging monsters like Driders, Grimlocks, and the horrifying Mind Flayer in a dark and twisting cavern type of world. NOTE: You must unlock the base game to load this expansion pack.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Hot Rod Remastered
description: Hot Rod Remastered DLC is a remastered version of Petard Games DLC for Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 and it includes 5 cars

name: Obsessive Revenge
description: After Mike's brother is arrested, victim of false accusations, Mike discovers that Jonathan was responsible for his brother's arrest, and so decides to kill him on a government ranch, where several government agents belonging to the witness protection service are.

name: Banana Shooter
description: In this game, you are not a banana, you are Dave, because you like to eat bananas, so the banana is taken away, the only way to get it is to kill other Dave. When you have the highest kill count, you will will get bananas. The whole game is a multiplayer battle type, you can configure your own gun or knife to fight against others. There are multiple maps in the game, you can get coins by killing enemies to upgrade, you can upgrade the movement speed, The upper limit of blood volume, but if you are accidentally killed, all upgrades will be cleared, which is a bit similar to roguelike, but it is a multiplayer battle type. And the map has a very hot back room recently, and my favorite strange core, which will definitely make your eyes shine.

name: Small Dark House Survival
description: Survival game with minimalist gameplay and roguelite elements, top view, barrage shooter The protagonist enters the reincarnation of time and needs to resist 50 waves of attacks from different-dimensional monsters in order to escape.

name: Merge Cats: Idle Game
description: Merge Cats - Idle Game is a classic and simple merging game. The game is simple and relaxing - merge cats of the same level and unlock new cats! You can make your own collection of cute cats. Which cat is the cutest?

name: Corn Defenders
description: A modern game inspired by many popular 1980s arcade games that depicts a student locked inside of a school. You will need to trade for and collect corn to escape. You will also need to run away from Dr. Small and the teachers

name: Kung Fu Grand King
description: Once a great hero and a servant of the Emperor, Lan Mei now enjoys a quiet life running a dojo. However, when a new evil appears, she is called back into the world of martial arts to take part in a tournament that will determine the true Kung Fu Grand King!

name: Monster Girls and the Mysterious Adventure 2
description: This is a "Mysterious Dungeon" style roguelike game where the terrain changes with each challenge. Make the monsters your "Friends" and go on a new adventure!

name: Airball
description: In this classic isometric action game, you have been transformed into a fragile ball of air by an evil wizard. Can you make your way through over 250 fiendish rooms to find the means to turn yourself back into a human?

name: Kaos Survival
description: KAOS SurVival is a survival game in an open world, where the player can explore and find items that will make his life easier. The player can build a shelter or a large fortress to keep his possessions and defend himself from other players.

name: Maze to the old castle
description: Journey through various types of mazes, forests, tree-mazes, mountains, cave-maze, castle ruins, amids natural life and see if thee can reach the old castle. Maze to the old castle seeks to a-maze relax challege as a oldschool casual logic path-finding maze solving game.

name: Seal of Evil
description: Seal of Evil is a mythical take on the tumultuous time marking the fall of the Zhou imperial dynasty. Out of this chaos emerges an uncompromising ruler, Ying Zheng, who has vowed to either unify China or bury it in fire.

name: Star Pilot
description: Star Pilot is all about Multiplayer Space Combat. You start with a Fighter and a Personal Space Station plus enough credits and items to fight in 3 different Arenas with 3 Modes. Star Pilot is Free; Win XPs and extra credits and unlock new Ships, Ranks and Ammos.

name: Submarine war
description: This is a military shooting game. Players need to find an aircraft carrier while driving a submarine and use torpedoes to sink the aircraft carrier to win the game.

name: Six Faces: Overpower
description: Fluid gameplay in a extremely challenging puzzles. Six faces, four powers, easy to learn, hard to master. A fun 3D Puzzle game. With tons of combination possibilities and challenging levels. Solve (if you can) all 64 hand-drawn puzzles.

name: Vine
description: Vine is a story that takes place inside the lung laboratory of Poro left behind on a planet where mankind has disappeared. A puzzle game in which you use a frog's tongue to solve puzzles.

name: The Abandoned
description: The Abandoned is a short First Person Horror experience where you will solve puzzles and use your abilities to blast through waves of enemies while you uncover the story one chapter at a time. Chapter 1 is included with the game, the remaining will be released as they are developed.

name: Two Falls: Nishu Takuashina
description: Immerse yourself in the harsh wilderness of 17th century Canada through the eyes of Maikan, a young Innu, and Jeanne, a French woman who crossed the Atlantic to start a new life. Decide how the characters will survive, and watch the impact of your choices unfold in this coming-of-age story!

name: Circuit Breaker
description: In the cyber-future of 2009, the most popular sport has become arena fighting. Challengers from all over gather to attempt to conquer gauntlets of robotic opponents for fortune and fame.

name: Sumy Shelltris: Iceblocks 3
description: Tetris? Not! Mutant Tetris!

name: Secrets of Magic 5: Back to School
description: Victoria and Beatrix are back at the School of Magic just in time to celebrate the best time of the year, Halloween!

name: Casebook 1899: The Leipzig Murders
description: Leipzig 1899 - A German city on the threshold of the 20th century characterised by industrialisation, progress and innovation. But the darker sides include theft, robbery and murder. Detective Joseph Kreiser takes up the fight against crime.

name: Eternal Dreamers: ShirA.I., the Newscaster
description: Your lovable newscaster, ShirA.I., offers her steady support to celebrate over 10000 players! Her mission to deliver news to all of humanity won’t be endangered by the Sudden Coma Phenomenon! *ShirA.I. can be recruited by talking to her in the Medical Bay.

name: Kooring VR Wonderland: Red Queen's Black Magic
description: It’s time to go to the “Wonderland”, the world of adventure!"Kooring Wonderland VR Red Queen's Black Magic" is the VR contents for the blockbuster family It tells the story of 12 adventuresThe fairytale-like storytelling gives the feeling of watching an animation. KOORING Forever!

name: Sok Max Pro
description: SOK MAX PRO - A massive upgrade of the game to professional functionality. Online statistics, undo of a move, dark theme, windowed mode and much more!

name: Amazin' George
description: Guide George home through a expansive maze world with fun abilities, tricks and challenges along the way! George is a fun game for all ages. Do you have what it takes to escape the maze?

name: Dead Zone
description: Gathering Storm Studio proudly present Dead Zone. Inspired by Retro Top-Down Arcade Shooters : Dead Zone offers a unique gaming experience within the modern zombie apocalypse genre. Where you have to loot, trade, craft and shoot your way to survival.

name: Unidentified
description: The government has been attacked by unidentified creatures, and you, as a mercenary, was hired by the government to clear all the threat. An FPS game which you can fight with those cunning creatures regardless of the weather, day and night change. Earn more and more reward to buy better weapons!

name: Zombie Hunter
description: This is an action game where you fight zombies and move forward. If you kill zombies, you will get coins. If you collect coins, you will get a bonus item. There are five scenarios prepared. There are also missions that are very difficult.

name: Ice Station Z
description: Thirdperson Open World Zombie Survival.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Mississippi Acres Preserve
description: From its stunning landscapes to its characteristic wildlife, Mississippi Acres Preserve holds a special place in the hearts of hunters. Now, after devastating flooding, warden Immi Davis needs your help to get the community back on their feet – and figure out what’s been going bump in the night.

name: Theseus: Mythological Hero
description: RPG with a complex maze, full of traps and some puzzles, where the hero must fight the furious minotaur. And also a battle against the god Chronos, to retrieve Athens' treasure and save the souls of his old friends. Where Princess Ariadne is his only help.

name: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol.1: Hot Springs and Beach Episodes
description: It’s the ultimate fanservice experience! A 2-in-1 yuri lewd adventure featuring Kairi and Ranko from LIP! Lewd Idol Project on a relaxing trip to the hot springs, and a hot visit to the beach! Join the fun and enjoy your day off while having a lot of girl-on-girl action! Are you gonna miss it?

name: Just Act Natural: Premium Version
description: The Premium Version of Just Act Natural is here! A one time purchase of the Premium Version gets you three all new game modes, a new map as well as all future content that will be added to Just Act Natural in the coming months!

name: Shooter Engine
description: A sci-fi shooter set on a space base

name: Exit 2
description: EXIT 2 Is an short horror game in which you have to collect items without getting cought by the creatures.

name: Ancient Soccer
description: Welcome to the global VR tournament. Here you control soccer teams of special non-human players to complete various challenges. Tactical and fast-paced, this game is designed to be the arena of competition for VR players all over the world!

name: Tailor Tales: Dimitri Plus
description: Tailor Tales: Dimitri Plus adds a longer epilogue for Dimitri. This epilogue is filled with explicit adult content and features the final (10th) CG. You also unlock the ability to skip gold and dress requirements for each chapter.

name: Rorys Restaurant Deluxe
description: Rory just graduated from culinary school but she's too broke to pay for her school debt! Help her open a small restaurant and earn money to pay her debts! Play Rory's Restaurant: A unique Match3 and Cooking game! Enjoy familiar Match3 game mechanics in 70 challenging levels!

name: Happy New Year, Zeliria!: Let's take another walk!
description: This story tells an alternative story when Maxx with his chosen one, Velga, returns to Earth.

name: Bloodlines: Tales of brotherhood
description: Embark on a quest to find your lost brother in this card based adventure system.

name: Inferno
description: Journey through the Nine Circles of Hell in this atmospheric puzzle game, which closely follows the epic poem "Inferno" by Dante Alighieri. Each circle has its unique mood and mechanics, and interspersed between the over 100 puzzles are plenty of artwork and quotes from the original poem.

name: Princess Defender: Episode 1
description: Several realms being attacked by monsters, and you don't know what to do, just fight

name: Welcome to Free Will: Episode 1
description: Welcome to Free Will - Episode 1 is the first episode of a choice-driven, adult Visual Novel game. You play as a young man who travels to a small town looking for his missing mother. As you soon find out, the town is packed with many beautiful women.

name: Kung Fury: Street Rage - The Arcade Strikes Back
description: Join Kung Fury and friends in the voice-acted beat ‘em up story of the century. This expansive DLC introduces an unforgettable story with the actors from the original motion picture. Also, boss fights!

name: Contract Rush DX
description: Contract Rush DX is a hand-animated 2D Shoot 'Em Up, with multiple playable characters. Collect powerful upgrades throughout levels, and unleash them to defeat difficult boss battles!

name: Hearts 3D Premium
description: Hearts 3D Premium brings a lot of game variants, challenging opponents and game environments with great 3D graphics on your PC.You can play in Singleplayer offline or LAN and Online Mode! The full animated Tutorial explains rules of the popular card game step by step.

name: Killer
description: Kill them all (KILL). Kill figures to gain points, upgrade your character with perks and debuffs, repeat the process of killing gaining and upgrading, win by achieving the highest score. Kill, Gain Upgrade, Repeat, Win.

name: Mushroom Garden Prime
description:
The hit series Mushroom Garden is going back to its roots! It's a prime time to be a mushroom lover!

Were you a funghi fanatic back in the day? Or is this your first time encountering these funghi friends? Either way, welcome to their world!

name: Sushi the Cat
description: Sushi the Cat is a homebrew platformer for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Water ha Ore no Musume
description: A 2000's VIPRPG game which begins as a parody of Dragon Quest 5, then slowly but surely flourishes into its own narrative spinning one of the most interwoven, complex, and hilarious plots.

name: Rick Astley: The Game
description:
A Game Boy homebrew game inspired by Rick Astley Never Gonna Give You Up music video. It is a mod of "Office Combat" by Robert Doman.
Rick Astley must reach is beloved at night-club. As he travels through the city, many people will slow him down.

name: Metroid Dread GBC Demake
description: A demake of the introduction of Metroid Dread for the Game Boy Color. A demo (v1) was released, but the author stopped working on it due to copyright.

name: Zelda 2 Redux
description:
Have you always tried to play through Zelda II and finding out it was either excruciatingly difficulty, unbalanced, too tough or perhaps found that it just has so many quirks that doesn’t make the game enjoyable?

This hack tries to address that by rebalancing the game, making some QoL changes and also some visual flare into the game, without compromising the original game’s design.

name: The Synergist
description: The Synergist is the newest Roguelite developed by two nobodies in our basement! Use your Alchemical Powers to barely survive being roasted by every evil diety you can think of! With over 23 different elemental combinations, you'll be able to roast, freeze, shock, or just obliterate your enemies!

name: Steel Ocean: Wolves of Deep Sea
description: It is a free-to-play shooting game.You may choose 6 types of warships used in the WWII to play PvP and PvE naval battle. Start the voyage with your warships and fight for the honor of your fleet!

name: Fury Fight
description: Angry hair curling dark cloud, Power fist smash titanium gold. moving instant as flash boom, running valiant over meteor stream. phantom gone with high gale, crack surely will banish the evil.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: High Isle
description: Welcome to High Isle, a part of Tamriel never-before-seen in the Elder Scrolls. Explore the Bretons' idyllic ocean enclave and seat of chivalric culture as you confront the ruinous forces of the Ascendant Lord.

name: Euclidean Escape
description: Historically inaccurate first-person puzzle game. Explore the ancient secrets of the Great Library and navigate through mystical mazes. Manipulate and combine the powers of Force, Energy and Matter to ascend a tower with challenges that rise along with your altitude.

name: Song of Souls
description: Fight as an unknown warrior with various weapons, and dive into The Forest of Souls to find the souls of Lost Ancient Kings. Challenge them and get their power, then finally face your terminative destiny.

name: KeepUp Survival: Tropical Island
description: A small tropical island for relaxing evenings. Explore this cute little map, go hunting and build a nice shelter.

name: Rote2: RoteSquare
description: A 6-key vertical scrolling rhythm game with a unique mechanic that allows notes to take up any number of lanes.

name: Pirate Solitaire 2
description: Play the new Pirate Solitaire right on the shores of Britain! Outplay seasoned sea dogs. Prove that you're the best of the best!

name: Fill & Cross: Royal Riddles
description: Solve the king's puzzles and gain access to his treasures! Solve 108 unique puzzles in 9 elegant locations.

name: Sacrosanct
description: nothing is inviolate. and that which is sacrosanct gets fucked. fuck god, kill heaven, marry boyfriend. in that order.

name: Wart
description: No random, pure strategic board games.

name: Snot
description: Snot is a top-down shooter minigame that's all about keeping cool and reloading. Stuck on a floor tile, brace your (booger) self and face endless hordes of micro organisms - fighting to survive as long as you can!

name: Virion
description: As a deadly virus, battle your way through the maze-like world of the human body. Facing the might of the immune system you must infect, replicate, evolve and conquer your host until they are no more in this top down, real time strategy game.

name: Start Again
description: A BL/yaoi mystery visual novel that follows a man named Sebastian as he’s forced into a game of life-or-death, alongside three strangers. Who put him there, and more importantly… who can he trust?

name: Azur Beam
description: Azur Beam is a fun arcade game with beautiful music, lots of levels and colorful illustrations of anime girls! In Azur Beam you will find 53 extraordinarily beautiful, difficult and interesting levels, after passing which you will open full access to the Gallery.

name: Elemental Roll
description: Betrayed by his own servants, Byle - The former King of Hell - was exiled from his kingdom to the Human World. Now Byle rolls through a world much larger than him looking for a way back home. Attempt to always go faster and reach new heights to get Byle's strength back !

name: Maya Star
description: In a magical land ruled by an ancient evil, a prophecy says that salvation will come with the awakening of a new hero. Explore different maps, fight evil creatures and decide the fate of Maya Star.

name: Locked Up
description: Together with Snezhana and her dog Ayda you will go to the woods for mushroom hunting. An ordinary adventure does not foreshadow adversity, until you decide to step into an uncharted plase… A short but atmospheric visual novel that will give you goosebumps.

name: Clockworld: Aroll's Legacy
description: Join Aro’s journey through this narrative mystery about self-determination, destiny and finding purpose in a broken world.Literally!Your decisions will pave the way - what kind of story will you experience together?

name: Eragon's Tale
description: Brave through the darkness in his dreams. Or die trying.

name: Vonbit
description: A retro arcade shooter with one-bit graphics

name: Clearcutting
description: Hand drawn idle forest resource management game. Watch the forest grow and choose to cut down sections to fulfill contracts for money.

name: Bubbles & Pearls
description: A VR arcade game that immerses you into an underwater experience, compete with your friends and family to achieve the longest dive and collect the highest number of pearls by collecting the bubbles that emerge from the abyss!

name: Darold the Doomer: Psychedelic Lucid Dreams
description: 3D Psychedelic Story Based RPG

name: Quijote: Quest for Glory
description: Quijote: Quest for Glory is a tactical card strategy game based on the work of Miguel de Cervantes. Lead Don Quixote on his heroic journey and experience some of the most familiar episodes of the classic novel published in the 17th century.

name: Our Way Down
description: You are suddenly spirited away to a dark plateau. Here, alone, you'd probably die. But, someone else is here sharing in your peril. Perhaps together, you can find a way out.

name: Five Stages of Pink
description: The story of a boy who wants a Normal life in the most Abnormal city in the world. Help Timor understand his cruel life in this supernatural city while trying to survive one more day.

name: Galpa the no limbs guy
description: Galpa was sleeping until he heard a sound that shook him out of bed. Galpa found a pipe out side his house. He looked inside and he got sucked in. He went to a place with shapes and more. Will Galpa get back home? 25 levels of shape blasting fun. rpg like world map

name: BokuRobo: Boxed Cell Robot Armies
description: The game is an auto-battler game with voxel robots that is both comically and tactically challenging.

name: Excavator Simulator
description: WANTED: Excavator driver! Who doesn't dream of swapping a shovel and spade for a big excavator? Even as children, we all played with excavators and trucks in the neighbourhood playgrounds. Enough dreaming! Now you take on the role of an excavator driver, eat, sleep, dig, repeat!

name: Pentagons Go Weee
description: A free-to-play 2D Rhythm-based action game where you don't have to be on the beat but rather have to dodge the beats. Compete with the world with global leaderboard and be number 1 in all difficulties: Easy, Hard and Impossible!? Take a deep dive into this retro-type game with over 5 songs.

name: Digital Diamond Baseball V10
description: Digital Diamond Baseball is a flexible, transparent, and hyper-accurate computerized baseball simulator that allows gamers to play games, series, tournaments, and entire seasons, using players from any baseball season in history.

name: The Dreaming Fox
description: The Dreaming Fox is a simple, clicker game that is meant for you to pass time while enjoying a soothing soundtrack and simple scenery.

name: Hidden Cats in Paris
description: "Meow meow meow mes amies! A short and pleasant experience in beautiful Paris! Start with a monochromatic illustration, relax, and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art. Advanced levels and extra bonuses. More than 680 hidden objects to find!"

name: Dirtyblock
description: In Dirtyblock, the user needs to control a small platform. It moves across the entire lower part of the game space. The platform needs to constantly hit the ball to prevent it from falling. The main purpose of the application is to destroy all the bricks.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Rally Adventure
description: Your Forza Horizon 5 Rally Adventure is here! Drive purpose-built rally monsters and conquer the rugged Sierra Nueva. Join three rally teams and attack Horizon’s most thrilling routes ever in Timed Rally and Multi-Car Races. Feel the intensity of massive dust trails and deformable roads in 10 new cars and experience the bursting flames of anti-lag. Explore dramatic craters, an abandoned quarry and an entirely smashable palm forest.

name: Harakiri! Geisha Girls
description: A new love simulation game MADE IN JAPAN! This slapstick love comedy is brimming with characters wreaking havoc in the glorious country of NIPPON! Get all lovey-dovey with one of the four girls (or all of them, you do you) and enjoy your new, improbable school life.

name: Beastmaster

name: Goal!: The Club Manager

name: The Mean Greens: Plastic Warfare - Wrestling Superstar "Kurt Angle"

name: Lilei and Han Meimei

name: Bloodhound

The game has only 5 levels in total, but the difficulty curve is a little steep. Sometimes the small soldier is more terrible than the boss, but I believe it won't be difficult for you.

Come on down to a place where you will never want to leaf. Relax and be the best tree you can be. 1-250 players.

name: Lighting Climbing

name: Down The Dead

name: Fireteam
description: A free to play FPS game brought to you by Ryan Laley Games. Shoot your weapons and throw your grenades to take down your opposition. Welcome to Fireteam soldier!

name: Warplanes: Battles over Pacific

name: Pepper's Castle

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Operation Cerberus North by Ground Pounder Sims
